column5: 4 of us heading to res. decellec next fri. for a week my favorite trip of the year my wife and one cousin are busy gettin stuff ready and asking same ? theve asked for the last 10 yrs.I take care of boat and truck and they act like ive never done this before ive been doing this for about 20 plus years they make me laugh.good luck to all that are heading up in the next couple of months.have fun jeff
Best of luck! We are trying a new lake this year but I will miss parts of the Decelles. Sorry we couldn't hook up last year. Safe travels and share a report when you return.
where are you going to try keek same area ?
Heading northeast to Lac Hebert with Air Tamarac. Flying out of Clova.

I hope you enjoy yourselfs sounds like more of a adventure than decelles.in 20 or 30 more years when I learn that lake from one end to the other ill try a new lake just for a challange. ( i hate to fly) let me know how you do.have fun jeff
That is what's so cool about Decelles - it's so HUGE. I'll go back there one day. It will always have a special place in my life as it was there that I enjoyed my first ever week of Canadian fishing.
